2.3.1.title: Ensure all build steps are defined as code
2.3.1.description: Use Pipeline as Code for build pipelines and their defined steps.
2.3.1.remediation: Convert pipeline instructions into code-based syntax, and upload them to the organization's version control platform.

2.3.5.title: Ensure access to the build process's triggering is minimized
2.3.5.description: Restrict access to the pipelines' triggers.
2.3.5.remediation: For every pipeline in use, grant only the necessary members permission to trigger it.

2.3.7.title: Ensure pipelines are automatically scanned for vulnerabilities
2.3.7.description: Scan pipelines for vulnerabilities. It is recommended to do that automatically.
2.3.7.remediation: For each pipeline, set automated vulnerabilities scanning.

2.3.8.title: Ensure scanners are in place to identify and prevent sensitive data in pipeline files
2.3.8.description: Detect and prevent sensitive data, such as confidential ID numbers, passwords, etc. in pipelines.
2.3.8.remediation: For every pipeline that is in use, set scanners that will identify and prevent sensitive data in it.
